product_name: Platypus Gravityworks Water Filter System - 4 Liter
long_description: Keep a supply of drinking water right in your campsite. The Platypus GravityWorksTM water filter delivers 4 liters of potable water in just 2.5 minutes without requiring a single pump stroke.
short_description: Keep a supply of drinking water right in your campsite. The Platypus GravityWorksTM water filter delivers 4 liters of potable water in just 2.5 minutes without requiring a single pump stroke.
